接口的使用
org.springframework.messaging.simp.user.SimpUser

  • 使用SimpUser的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.messaging.simp.user
    Support for handling messages to "user" destinations (i.e. destinations that are unique to a user's sessions), primarily translating the destinations and then forwarding the updated message to the broker.
    org.springframework.web.socket.messaging
    WebSocket integration for Spring's messaging module.

    • org.springframework.messaging.simp.user中SimpUser的使用

      返回SimpUser的org.springframework.messaging.simp.user中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      SimpUser SimpSession.getUser()
      Return the user associated with the session.
      SimpUser MultiServerUserRegistry.getUser(java.lang.String userName) 
      SimpUser SimpUserRegistry.getUser(java.lang.String userName)
      Get the user for the given name.
      返回变量类型为SimpUser的类型的org.springframework.messaging.simp.user中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.util.Set<SimpUser> MultiServerUserRegistry.getUsers() 
      java.util.Set<SimpUser> SimpUserRegistry.getUsers()
      Return a snapshot of all connected users.
